items.title: FBI executes search warrant at Washington Post reporter’s home
items.description: The search came as part of an investigation into a government contractor accused of illegally retaining classified government materials.

items.title: U.S. withdraws some forces from Middle East as Trump weighs Iran strikes
items.description: The Pentagon has begun removing troops and equipment from al-Udeid Air Base in Qatar, echoing measures taken before U.S. strikes on Iran’s nuclear fac...

items.title: Vance steps in to host White House talks on Greenland’s future
items.description: Diplomats from Denmark and Greenland had originally requested the meeting with Secretary of State Marco Rubio after provocative statements from the pr...

items.title: Trump makes obscene gesture, mouths expletive at Detroit factory heckler
items.description: A cellphone video captured Trump twice mouthing “f--- you” and raising his middle finger toward a line worker shouting at him inside the Ford factory.

items.title: Thom Tillis wants you to know something: ‘I’m sick of stupid’
items.description: The North Carolina Republican has been at the forefront this month of staking out anti-MAGA ground and criticizing Trump’s aides.
